Package io.tarantool.driver.api.tuple.operations

Class TupleOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.tarantool.driver.api.tuple.operations.TupleOperations
  • public final class TupleOperations
extends Object
    Create list of TupleOperation for update and upsert requests
